items.text:
def on_arrow_click(self, item_id):
    groups = list(self.manager.group_manager.groups.items())
    if groups:
        group_names = [group['name'] for group in [g[1] for g in groups]]
        selected_group = tk.StringVar()
        dialog = tk.Toplevel(self.manager.root)
        dialog.title("Seleccionar Grupo")
        
        def on_select():
            if selected_group.get():
                group_id = next(g[0] for g in groups if g[1]['name'] == selected_group.get())
                self.manager.group_manager.add_item_to_group(item_id, group_id)
                print(f"Item {item_id} added to group {selected_group.get()}")
            dialog.destroy()
        
        tk.Label(dialog, text="Seleccione un grupo:").pack()
        for name in group_names:
            tk.Radiobutton(dialog, text=name, variable=selected_group, value=name).pack()
        
        tk.Button(dialog, text="Agregar", command=on_select).pack()
        dialog.protocol("WM_DELETE_WINDOW", dialog.destroy)
        dialog.transient(self.manager.root)
        dialog.grab_set()
        self.manager.root.wait_window(dialog)
    else:
        tk.messagebox.showinfo("Sin Grupos", "No hay grupos disponibles. Cree un grupo primero.")
